name: Muncher!
overview: Muncher! is a Pac Man variant. The main change here is that the booth in the center contains bonus fruit, instead of launching the ghosts, and also a key must be picked up in order to open it and grab the fruit inside. As always, the player must avoid the ghosts and collect the dots, with power-pills available so as to make the ghosts edible, for bonus points and to buy some time.
